shortdesc.ph: Add or update the visual effect for the specified node ID and template.

p.codeblock: virtual int addOrUpdateVideoEffect(uint32_t nodeId, const char* templateName) = 0;

section.p: Used to add or update the specified video effect node and template.

plentry.pd:
The unique identifier or combination of video effect nodes. See for details. Examples:
Single effect: VIDEO_EFFECT_NODE_ID.BEAUTY
Combined effects: VIDEO_EFFECT_NODE_ID.BEAUTY | VIDEO_EFFECT_NODE_ID.STYLE_MAKEUP

Unique identifier or combination of video effect nodes. See for details. Examples:
Single effect: VIDEO_EFFECT_NODE_ID::BEAUTY
Combined effects: VIDEO_EFFECT_NODE_ID::BEAUTY | VIDEO_EFFECT_NODE_ID::STYLE_MAKEUP
Name of the special effects template. If set to or an empty string, the SDK loads the default parameter configuration from the resource package.
Name of the special effect template. If set to or an empty string, the SDK loads the default configuration from the resource package.

section.props: bp cs electron flutter native rn unity unreal
section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.props: apple bp cs electron rn unity unreal
ul.li: < 0: Failure. See for details and resolution suggestions.
< 0: The method call fails. See the error codes in AgoraBaseConstants.
